Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2012 12:30PM Thrive55 wrote: Hello, Weesa, thank you for posting and the good news.  I am new to this blog - having just registered - and as a Stage IIIC survivor just a few months out of chemo and radiation, I am so glad to find this community.  I am looking forward to learning from everyone and celebrating major milestones like yours - it gives me great hope!  It has been hard for me to find others with a similar diagnosis, so I look forward to connecting (and updating my profile as well!), and learning about how to make the most of it with slouchfests, etc. Congratulations!
Posts.Title: Postcard from the edge of ten years out.... weesa lifelover
